trans-unit.source: Contains the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS"></xref> that were originally imported for this method from the COM type library.
The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) applies this attribute to methods.
This attribute is applied when a type library is imported and should never be changed.
It is only applied when the method's <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS> evaluate to non zero.
The attribute is designed to be used by tools that need to know how the original <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS> were set.
The common language runtime does not use this attribute.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TypeLibFuncAttribute" name="TypeLibFuncAttribute" href=""></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibFuncFlags"></xref> value.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibFuncFlags"></xref> value for the attributed method as found in the type library it was imported from.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TypeLibFuncAttribute" name="TypeLibFuncAttribute" href=""></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibFuncFlags"></xref> value.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibFuncFlags"></xref> value for the attributed method as found in the type library it was imported from.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibFuncFlags"></xref> value for this method.
